tool_description: Get publicly accessible information from autotrader.com using our Scraper API. Get Information such as Search Results, Listing Information and URL Extraction.
name: AutoTrader
title: AutoTrader

api_list.name: Get Vehicle By URL
Search By URL
api_list.description:
Get Search Results Information from URL.
Used for when highly custom filters are needed.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results Page URL.
Used for when highly custom filters are needed.

api_list.name: Extract URL
Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results By Keyword and Filters.

optional_parameters.name: mileage
optional_parameters.description:
If you want to get vehicles over 200,000 mileage
write **200001**

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Options:

- relevance
- lowToHighPrice
- highToLowPrice
- lowToHighDistance
- highToLowDistance
- oldestListing
- mostRecentListing
- lowToHighMileage
- highToLowMileage
- highToLowYear
- lowToHighYear
